name: GreenhouseVeg
body:
## I Started a Blog

_Date: 21 Jan 2013_  
_Music: Low - I Started a Joke_

### What and Why
I wanted to start blogging for some time now, and here comes my first shot at it. The primary motivation is the need to share knowledge, which I see as a step in my quest for becoming a [software craftsman](http://manifesto.softwarecraftsmanship.org).

I need to share what I learn for 2 simple reasons:
* in order not to forget it
* trying to explain things to others shows there's more to be learned.  
So basically this is going to be a *programming* blog, because this is what I'm _really_ interested in and trying to do for a living. At the same time, I feel that my skills are _really_ underdeveloped, especially when I read about young hackers creating fantastic software. I'm not that young (programming is my second career) and way far from daring to put the word _hacker_ anywhere near me, but why not help this by [exposing my ignorance](http://ofps.oreilly.com/titles/9780596518387/emptying_the_cup.html#expose_your_ignorance)?

Besides this main reason - _I want to be a great programmer_ - I also want to be a more fluent, faster and better-styled writer (in that order). And how do I get to Carnegie Hall?

I will try writing texts here in the way I myself expect from a good technical reading:
* to the point but with enough detail
* with relevant references and good layout
* and a bit of humour sometimes.

I'm not sure if I will put any personal information here, but at least I'm gonna say that my nickname is the anagram of my full name (the first being Eugene). I picked that up from another guy's programming blog :)

### What+

There's another topic very dear to me, and which I feel much more comfortable talking about - *music*.  
I consider myself a rather passionate _vinyl_ collector
